book_overview.premise: Amid Detroit's vibrant streets, 9-year-old Alex Rivera channels his dyslexia into dazzling NFT street art, where mastering sight words unlocks digital masterpieces and transforms his frustrations into a creative empire, rallying his adoptive family in a colorful quest that merges urban culture, technology, and reading resilience.

name_age_background.name: Alex Rivera
name_age_background.background: Mixed-race (Black and Latino) boy from an adoptive family in inner-city Detroit, with foster siblings

personality_traits: Creative and passionate about their interest
Resilient when pursuing what they love
Kind-hearted but sometimes defensive about difficulties
protagonist_profile.passion: NFT street art collectives empowering young urban artists in 2025
protagonist_profile.growth_arc: Alex avoids reading tasks due to sight word mix-ups, leading to frustration in art class; a breakthrough comes when a word-tag wins an NFT contest; he masters recognition through art practice, then teaches his siblings via collaborative murals

mentor_guide.personality: Patient, encouraging, sees potential in protagonist
mentor_guide.function: Provides explicit instruction and connects passion to skill

peer_group.description: 3-4 diverse classmates with varying learning profiles
peer_group.function: Normalize struggles, provide collaboration opportunities, show different paths

parallel_adult.starting_belief: Worried about protagonist's struggles, potentially fixed mindset

secondary_setting.primary: Detroit neighborhood streets and community art center
secondary_setting.secondary: Digital NFT gallery where sight words unlock hidden murals

setting_description.sensory_details: Vivid descriptions of creative spaces, technology, peer interactions
setting_description.memorable_elements: The NFTs 'evolve' based on sight word accuracy, turning simple tags into interactive cityscapes

contemporary_hook_integration.hook: NFT street art collectives empowering young urban artists in 2025
contemporary_hook_integration.story_function: Alex's street art passion integrates sight words as graffiti tags in his NFT designs, repetitive sketching helping him memorize and recognize them instantly
contemporary_hook_integration.why_kids_care: Connects to current interests and aspirations of 9-10 year olds in 2025
contemporary_hook_integration.authenticity: Protagonist's genuine passion, not a gimmick

progression: Discovery: Connection between passion and skill revealed
Practice: Deliberate work integrated with creative activity
educational_integration_plan.teaching_moments: Explicit instruction scenes with mentor, systematic skill building
educational_integration_plan.creative_activity_connection: Alex's street art passion integrates sight words as graffiti tags in his NFT designs, repetitive sketching helping him memorize and recognize them instantly
